main event: An unidentified flying object appearing as a hazy orange bar of light was observed in Pleasant Hill, California on June 7, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as having a brighter appearance at the ends compared to the middle., The observation lasted for approximately 20 seconds., The sighting occurred shortly after a low-flying airplane was spotted in the vicinity., The witness had seen similar objects in the past, describing them as moving with high speed and erratic motion., The reported speed of the object is estimated at around 2200 mph.
sighted object: hazy bar of light, orange in color
witness description: The witness is a chemist, aged 32.
